title: Apex Legends Mobile is now live for iOS and Android
content:
It has been a long time coming but Apex Legends has finally arrived in the mobile space. After teasing the game last month, Apex Legends Mobile can now be downloaded globally for iOS and Android. The game was announced last month and was offered as a companion piece for its console and PC  counterpart. The Apex Legends Mobile

The post Apex Legends Mobile is now live for iOS and Android appeared first on XDA.
description: After being announced last month, Apex Legends Mobile is now officially live globally for iOS and Android. Download it now!
